voices.name: Rachel
voices.preview_text: Hello! I'm Rachel. I bring a professional and clear tone to your corporate presentations and educational content.

voices.name: Adam
voices.preview_text: Hi, I'm Adam. My confident and authoritative voice is perfect for business presentations and professional narrations.

voices.name: Domi
voices.useCase: Marketing videos, social media content, promotional material
voices.preview_text: Hey there! I'm Domi, and I'm super excited to help you create engaging content that really connects with your audience!

voices.name: Josh
voices.useCase: Storytelling, audiobooks, guided meditations, wellness content
voices.preview_text: Hello, I'm Josh. My warm and friendly voice creates a comfortable atmosphere for storytelling and personal connection.

voices.name: Bella
voices.useCase: Gaming content, casual videos, youth-oriented content
voices.preview_text: Hi! I'm Bella! I love bringing energy and fun to gaming videos and casual content that connects with younger audiences!

voices.name: Antoni
voices.useCase: Documentaries, audiobooks, serious narrations, educational content
voices.preview_text: Good day. I am Antoni. My deep, authoritative voice is ideal for documentaries and compelling narrative storytelling.

voices.name: Elli
voices.useCase: Customer service, tutorials, explanatory videos, vlogs
voices.preview_text: Hi there! I'm Elli. I'm here to help make your tutorials and customer-facing content feel warm and approachable.

voices.name: Arnold
voices.useCase: Movie trailers, dramatic content, powerful announcements
voices.preview_text: I am Arnold. With a commanding presence and deep resonance, I bring gravitas to your most important announcements.

voices.name: Emily
voices.useCase: Luxury brands, educational content, sophisticated presentations
voices.preview_text: Hello, I'm Emily. My refined British accent adds elegance and sophistication to your premium content.

voices.name: Matilda
voices.useCase: General purpose, news, information delivery, versatile content
voices.preview_text: Hello, I'm Matilda. My versatile and neutral American accent works well for a wide range of professional applications.
